channel.title: Swedish Tech Events (Stockholm)
channel.description: Events for developers, technologists, and other geeks in Sweden

item.title: 2021-11-11 17:30 Teaser: Kubernetes - West Forest Tech meetup
item.description: Kubernetes is an open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management. It was originally designed by Google, and is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Mikael is a consultant at West Forest Techno...

item.title: 2021-11-18 17:30 Lärdomar från entreprenören bakom produktbolaget Black Cat - West Forest Tech meetup
item.description: Vill du lära dig mer om hur det är att driva ett produktbolag från start?Vill du höra om misstagen från en annan entreprenör, kanske för att inte göra samma misstag själv? Agenda:Bolagsform för/nackdel Stegvis Design/tillverkning/import/Sälj/marknadsföring/Likvidite...

item.title: 2021-10-27 15:30 Stockholm OPA meetup with Styra and Avassa - Stockholm OPA users
item.description: Curious or experienced with Open Policy Agent. Anders Eknert dev Advocate at OPA will talk about the latest news and updates on OPA Anders and Fredrik from Avassa will give an example on how to use OPA in an edge computing use case. Your are welcome from 15.00 and ...

item.title: 2021-10-15 09:00 Säkerhetskollen - Dataföreningen Meet&Learn Stockholmskretsen
item.description: Är du orolig över säkerheten i din mobil? Att hackare kan ta över den och stjäla information eller pengar? Eller att appar spionerar på vad du gör och var du är? Välkommen den 15 oktober till Dataföreningen på Fleminggatan 7 i Stockholm. Studerande från Xenter Yrkeshögs...

item.title: 2021-10-25 19:00 Swedish Power BI Usergroup October Meetup - Swedish Power BI User Group
item.description: It's finally time for the next meetup, and this one is IN PERSON! For the first time since the world basically ended back in March of 2020, we will get to meet in person in Stockholm again. This event will be an in-person event only, but we *will* figure out the new toys they ...

item.title: 2021-10-19 17:30 Jfokus Foo Bar - Jforum Stockholm
item.description: We miss to see you all in person! We felt that we needed a place just to hang-out after office hours. We found Kungsbiljarden! The bar offers a solid range of drinks with something for everyone. Beer in the form of IPA, pale ale, ale, lager, pilsner, witbier, weissbier ...

item.description: Topic: - The Power of User Experience Design and what you should know Agenda: - A bit of history for context - Gain clarity about the buzzwords & titels you might have heard - How it works, what are the process and tools that can be used - Return...

item.title: 2021-11-11 14:00 OpenInfra Forum #10! - OpenInfra User Group Sweden

item.title: 2021-10-13 08:00 This weeks Lean Coffee - Stockholm Lean Coffee

item.description: Welcome to a OWASP Stockholm event! Finally we can meet IRL again and we will fire off with a Secure Development event hosted by Omegapoint at their new office site. Location: Jakobsbergsgatan 24, Auditorium. Time: October 21, 17.00 – 20.00 Lighter food &...
